entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Brooks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:43 AM MDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brooks 07:00 AM MDT Monday 20 March 2023
Temperature: -15.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -17.4°C
Wind: NNE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 07:37 AM MDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 07:37 AM MDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
